timeline.bodyText:

And why is there a rotation field at all, can't the rotation be included in the matrix?

replies.bodyText:
The Forge class calls them leftRot and rightRot. Tbh a lot of these names in this class are a mess and warrant a PR of their own.

And why is there a rotation field at all, can't the rotation be included in the matrix?

It is. It's a cached version that may be recomputed in the getter.
replies.author: Earthcomputer

replies.bodyText: These fields are really only initialized but never used... The only getRotation2 is retained because when IDENTITY is constructed, getRotation2 is called to initialize the components
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: There were probably such getters in the original source which proguard stripped because they weren't used elsewhere.
replies.author: Earthcomputer

replies.bodyText: Can I leave this field rename till later because these fields don't really matter?
